text:
What does Atlan crawl from Redash? | Atlan Documentation
Skip to main content
On this page
Atlan crawls and maps the following assets and properties from Redash.
Once you've
crawled Redash
, you can
use connector-specific filters
for quick asset discovery. The following filters are currently supported for these assets:
Queries
-  Schedule, Is Published, and Redash tags filters
Visualizations
-  Type filter
Dashboards
-  Redash tags filter
danger
